summary: Two hosting prehistoric dinosaurs, Rex and Herb, guide you along a typical small town's Christmas choral celebration. There's just one catch, the entire town population is made out of clay. Special guest stars: the California Raisins.
cast: Tim Conner|Johnny Counterfit|Greg Black|Bernadette Coughlin|Kiefer Davis|Pat Harryman|Amy Miller|Deborah Miller|Joni Miller|Roxy Ragozzino|Dan Sachs|Jim Steinberger|Reid Stewart|Ron Tinsley
title: A Claymation Christmas Celebration
